so we can find out what that directory is called, that you unpacked to
the "~" is a shortcut for your home directory so "/home/daniel" is the same as "~" if you are logged in as daniel
by default gnome's Desktop directory is written like "Desktop"
the "." at the beginnning of your line is the current directory, you need to be in the correct directory to make this work.
